title: Teradyne Robotics leaning into U.S. manufacturing reboot
description:
Teradyne Robotics plans to open its U.S. headquarters near Detroit in 2026 to boost manufacturing for UR and MiR and better serve customers.

The post Teradyne Robotics leaning into U.S. manufacturing reboot appeared first on The Robot Report.
